Text: RE QuestionHowdy Miss Kim Bet you can wait to say Ariva Derchi and see Italy Where abouts are you going Two of my sisters went to Northern Italy a year ago and had a great time We had rain everyday in Scotland but it was still so beautiful One night we stayed on the coast of the Irish Sea and saw there was a ferry about a halfablock down the street so checked out where we could go Ended up taking a high speed ferry across the Irish Sea to Larne and did a day trip of the Irish Coast Fantastic We did a small cruise boat on Loch Ness a tour bus a double decker bus the train the ferry and the tube The second to the last day we drove to Gatwick drop the car in short term parking and got a student pass must look younger than we thought and took the train to Victoria Station Walked over to Buckingham Palace Hyde Park and Piccadilly Circus Took the underground to the Tower Hadnt been there since probably the year you were born They have cleaned the entire outside of the tower and it looks fabulous All the displays have been reworked and everything was so interesting Could easily have spent an entire day there Were coming down the end of November for Mr Matts st birthday Mark Michelle and Matt are arriving Aug and leaving Sept We did get to see them on our layover on the way back from England They met us at the airport and we went to Pappasitos Nothing like being up hours and eating chips and salsa Have a wonderful time Take care hugs M
